item.title: OR-74 West/OR-207 North at OR-74/OR-207 Split in Lexington
item.description: OR-74/OR-207 North at OR-74/OR-207 split in Lexington. Turn right on OR-207 North to Boardman, Hermiston, and Pendleton. Continue straight for OR-74 West to Ione and Arlington.

item.title: OR-206 East/OR-207 North Approaching OR-74
item.description: OR-206 East/OR-207 North approaching OR-74 in Heppner.

item.title: OR-74 East/OR-207 South at OR-206
item.description: OR-74 East/OR-207 South at OR-206 in Heppner. Turn left to continue east on OR-74 to Fairgrounds, Pilot Rock, and Pendleton. Continue straight for OR-206/OR-207 South to Condon and Spray. Use OR-206/OR-207 for the Blue Mountain Scenic Byway.

item.title: OR-74 East/OR-207 South - Lexington
item.description: OR-74 East/OR-207 South in Lexington, Oregon.

item.title: OR-74 East at OR-207
item.description: OR-74 East at OR-207. Turn left for OR-207 north to Boardman, Hermiston, and Pendleton. Continue straight for OR-74 East/OR-207 South to Heppner.

item.title: OR-74 South Approaching OR-207
item.description: OR-74 South Approaching OR-207 in Lexington.

item.title: OR-74 North at OR-206/OR-207
item.description: OR-74 north at OR-206 and OR-207 in Heppner. Turn right to continue north on OR-74 North and OR-207 North to Lexington, Ione, and Arlington. Turn left on Main St. for OR-207 south and OR-206 west to Condon and Spray.

item.title: US-395 South at OR-74
item.description: US-395 south at OR-74. Turn right for OR-74 west to Heppner and Condon. Merge left for US-395 south to Ukiah and John Day.
